name: Cauliflower Bread
description: This cauliflower bread is a super tasty vegan bread option with added veggies! Easy to make and ready to eat within an hour.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup grated cauliflower (i have to try 1 cup cauliflower next time)
2 tsp melted vegan butter/oil for dough
1 tsp melted vegan butter to brush

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, Sift in the flours , salt, spices and baking powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, Sift in the flours , salt, spices and baking powder.

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor or by hand, make dough of all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In a food processor or by hand, make dough of all the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: The dough should not be sticky. Let the dough stand for 10 minutes and then knead again.
recipeInstructions.name: The dough should not be sticky. Let the dough stand for 10 minutes and then knead again.

recipeInstructions.text: Make a loaf of it and place on baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a loaf of it and place on baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees f / 270ºc for about 30 minutes till golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees f / 270ºc for about 30 minutes till golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: You can grate some cheese on the top before taking the bread out to cool.
recipeInstructions.name: You can grate some cheese on the top before taking the bread out to cool.
